PageflipLanguage.IntrotwoText:
Welcome!
This is an online publication from UniFlip with virtual pages that can be turned with the mouse or by clicking the navigation bar. You can search inside the publication for words, figures and full sentences; print and zoom; download the publication in PDF format; send to a friend; and much more. The UniFlip system reduces unnecessary print-outs and saves on expensive toner cartridges, making it environmentally friendly. The online service can be used by anyone FREE of charge. It is fast and easy to create and publish an online publication directly from Word, PDF, Excel or PowerPoint files. Try it today for free! www.UniFlip.com

Private users and non-commercial associations may create and distribute publications FREE OF CHARGE via www.uniflip.com Upon the purchase of the license by companies and profitable organisations, this text and advertising banners will no longer appear and this page can be replaced with contents for commercial use, personal welcome text and logos.
